fulltext:
Trung  Do
https://www.linkedin.com/in/trungdo1993
doquoctrung93@gmail.com | +84947054293
EXPERIENCE
PRUDENTIAL LIFE INSURANCE | PROJECT MANAGER
August 2018 – Present | Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
• Manage two key projects with 10-15 headcounts each
• First project: ChatBot to handle claim policy service automatically, reduce
workload of call center by 30 percents and increase customer satisfaction by
30 percents
• Second project: Data Analytics to investigate and predict potential fraud
patterns coming from past data
COC COC CO., LTD | SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
Oct 2017 – July 2018 | Hanoi, Vietnam
• Process raw data from system and extract requested information using Bash
shell command line
• Help our client supporters solve client issues and requests which are related to
system
• Develop internal tools using Java
BARCLAYS BANK US | SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
March 2017 – Oct 2017 | Wilmington, DE
• Developed full stack web applications using Node.js, MongoDB, Java
• Coordinated with other developers and scrum masters in full Agile cycle
• Manually tested ﬁnancial cases, created test strategy in Excel and updated data
in TSYS
ENGINE ROOM TECHNOLOGY | APPLICATION DEVELOPER
October 2016 – March 2017 | Philadelphia, PA
• Customized web applications using different kinds of CMS (LAMP, Drupal,
Wordpress and Salesforce) with focus on front-end design (HTML, CSS,
JavaScript, jQuery, Sass, PHP)
• Cooperated with other developers and project managers following Agile
methodology
• Constantly updated the projects through Jira and stored the code through
Bitbucket
SOFTWARE MERCHANT INC | MOBILE APPLICATION DEVELOPER
July 2016 – October 2016 | Wayne, PA
• Provided enterprise-level iOS application consulting and development service
using both Swift and Objective C
• Followed Spring/Agile methodology and constantly gave updates to project
managers for review
SOCIALLADDER | SOFTWARE DEVELOPER
March 2015 – Sep 2015 | Philadelphia, PA
• Fixed memory leaks issue of the application on Android devices
• Improved layout of application by converting from TextView to WebView
• Connected Spotify user authentication to the applications
• Deployed feed entries, challenges, campaigns and rewards for users
EDUCATION
DREXEL UNIVERSITY
BS IN COMPUTER ENGINEERING
Graduated in June 2016
LINKS

LinkedIn:// Trung Do
Quora:// Trung Do
SKILLS
PROGRAMMING LANGUAGES
Java • Swift • C++ • Python • Objective C
• PHP • SQL • JavaScipt• HTML• CSS •
jQuery • Sass
FRAMEWORK/PLATFORM
Java EE • Bootstrap • Cocoapods •
Android • iOS
OTHERS
Linux • Git

Digital System Projects
